maven.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject
maven.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: A food maven could also be called a gourmet.
maven.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject
maven.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Stockmarket mavens say such a pattern usually signals more gains ahead.
